title: Force fresh frontend build via deploy-retry marker update

requirements.summary: Trigger a deployment retry by changing the contents of the deploy-retry marker file without affecting app behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/public/deploy-retry.txt has a modified first-line timestamp/string so the file diff is non-empty.
No other files are changed as part of this request.
The application behavior and user-facing UI text remain unchanged (this is a deploy-trigger only).

file_operations.description: Update only the first-line marker string (e.g., replace the existing ISO timestamp with a new ISO timestamp) to force a fresh deployment build; do not change any other files or any functional code/UI behavior.
